Detailed Description

template<class TYPE>
class SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >

Class SideDataFactory is a factory class used to allocate new instances of SideData objects. It is a subclass of the patch data factory class and side data is a subclass of patch data. Both the factory and data classes are templated on the type of the contained object (e.g., double or int).

Note that it is possible to create a side data factory to allocate and manage data for cell sides associated with a single coordinate direction only. See the constructor for more information.

See also:
pdat::SideData

pdat::PatchDataFactory

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class TYPE>
SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::SideDataFactory ( int  depth,
const hier::IntVector &  ghosts,
bool  fine_boundary_represents_var 
) [explicit]

The constructor for the side data factory class. The ghost cell width, depth (number of components), and fine boundary representation arguments give the defaults for all edge data objects created with this factory. Also, the default data allocation scheme is to generate storage for sides in all coordinate directions (default integer vector of all 1's). To use this factory to manage side data objects for sides associated with a single direction only, provide the directions vector argument. A zero entry indicates that data for that direction is not wanted. Otherwise, data will be created for that direction. See the SideVariable<DIM> class header file for more information.

template<class TYPE>
SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::SideDataFactory ( int  depth,
const hier::IntVector &  ghosts,
bool  fine_boundary_represents_var,
const hier::IntVector &  directions 
) [explicit]

Same as previous constructor but with directions vector of 1's

Member Function Documentation

template<class TYPE>
tbox::Pointer< hier::PatchDataFactory > SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::cloneFactory ( const hier::IntVector &  ghosts  )  [virtual]

Abstract virtual function to clone a patch data factory.

This will return a new instantiation of the abstract factory with the same properties. The properties of the cloned factory can then be changed without modifying the original.

Parameters:
ghosts default ghost cell width for concrete classes created from the factory.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
tbox::Pointer< hier::PatchData > SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::allocate ( const hier::Patch &  patch  )  const [virtual]

Virtual factory function to allocate a concrete side data object. The default information about the object (e.g., ghost cell width) is taken from the factory.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
tbox::Pointer< hier::BoxGeometry > SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::getBoxGeometry ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [virtual]

Allocate the box geometry object associated with the patch data. This information will be used in the computation of intersections and data dependencies between objects.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD int SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::getDepth (  )  const

Get the depth (number of components). This is the depth that will be used in the instantiation of side data objects.

template<class TYPE>
SAMRAI_INLINE_KEYWORD const hier::IntVector & SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::getDirectionVector (  )  const

Return constant reference to vector describing which coordinate directions have data associated with this side data object. A vector entry of zero indicates that there is no data array allocated for the corresponding coordinate direction. A non-zero value indicates that a valid data array is maintained for that coordinate direction.

template<class TYPE>
size_t SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::getSizeOfMemory ( const hier::Box &  box  )  const [virtual]

Calculate the amount of memory needed to store the side data object, including object data and dynamically allocated data.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::fineBoundaryRepresentsVariable (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return a boolean value indicating how data for the side quantity will be treated on coarse-fine interfaces. This value is passed into the constructor. See the FaceVariable<DIM> class header file for more information.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::dataLivesOnPatchBorder (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return true since the side data index space extends beyond the interior of patches. That is, side data lives on patch borders.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.

template<class TYPE>
bool SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory< TYPE >::validCopyTo ( const tbox::Pointer< hier::PatchDataFactory > &  dst_pdf  )  const [virtual]

Return whether it is valid to copy this SideDataFactory to the supplied destination patch data factory. It will return true if dst_pdf is SideDataFactory or OutersideDataFactory, false otherwise.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::PatchDataFactory.
